div.p: We are committed to learning environments that fit every student.
A 14.8% improvement in three years and were not letting up.
Volunteers and community partners play a huge role in student success.
Our emphasis on early learning sets a foundation for achievement.

p.br: To measure progress toward meeting the School Boards strategic goals, we use a set of benchmarks that let parents and community members track our progress. Its like a report card for each school and the whole district.
